chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
s1: state
p: proc A
s2: state
P: state -> proc A -> Prop

Goal:
always s1 p P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always s2 p P

Premises:
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv
nid = nat : Set
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
always : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop
network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
alw_envs' : forall (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s1 p scs P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always_sc s2 p scs P
alw_refl : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> P s p
alw_coh : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In coherent
alw_safe : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always s p P -> forall sc : schedule, safe p sc s
alw_refl' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p sc P -> P s p
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc A), P W A p
rely_trans : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 s3 : state), network_rely w this s1 s2 -> network_rely w this s2 s3 -> network_rely w this s1 s3
alw_safe' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p (sc :: scs) P -> safe p sc s
alw_coh' : forall (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In coherent
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc A | Ret : A -> proc A | Act : action W A this -> proc A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc B -> (B -> proc A) -> proc A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A Arguments proc [this W] _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
always_sc : forall A : Type, state -> proc A -> seq schedule -> (state -> proc A -> Prop) -> Prop
step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc A -> schedule -> state -> proc A -> Prop
pstep : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc A -> schedule -> state -> proc A -> Prop
pstep_network_sem : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> network_step W this s1 s2
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc A -> proc A
rely_coh : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_rely w this s1 s2 -> Coh w s1 /\ Coh w s2
with_inv_rely' : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (z : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_rely (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) z s1 s2 -> network_rely (mkWorld pr) z s1 s2
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
rely_loc : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_rely w this s1 s2 -> find this (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) = find this (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
inject_step : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (s1' s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), valid (U \+ W) -> s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> network_step (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step W this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s1 -> forall (s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s1 s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Actions.Action : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a_safe : state -> Prop), (forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W) -> forall a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop, (forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r) -> (forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2) -> Actions.action W V this
pstep_inv : forall (this : nid) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 s2 : state) (sc : schedule) (t t' : proc A), s1 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> pstep s1 t sc s2 t' -> s2 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))
proc_progress : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc A) (sc : schedule), s \In Coh W -> safe p sc s -> good p sc -> exists (s' : state) (p' : proc A), pstep s p sc s' p'
Record action (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) : Type := Action { a_safe : state -> Prop; a_safe_coh : forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W; a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop; step_total : forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r; step_sem : forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2 } Arguments Actions.action _ _%type_scope Arguments Actions.Action [W] [V]%type_scope [this] [a_safe]%function_scope _%function_scope [a_step]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), proc A -> schedule -> state -> Prop
Injection.Exports.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Idle : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2
Act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), action W A this -> proc A
sem_extend : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), injects U V K -> forall (s1 s2 s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> s2 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)
network_rely' = fun (w : world) (this : nid) => fix network_rely' (n : nat) (s1 s2 : state) {struct n} : Prop := match n with | 0 => s1 = s2 /\ s1 \In Coh w | n'.+1 => exists (z : nat_eqType) (s3 : state), [/\ this != z, network_step w z s1 s3 & network_rely' n' s3 s2] end : world -> nid -> nat -> state -> state -> Prop Arguments network_rely' _ _ _%nat_scope
Actions.skip_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol) (pf : getProtocol W l = p) (V : Type) (f : forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) (s1 : state) (S : Actions.skip_safe W s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.skip_step pf f S s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Inject : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc A -> proc A
step_coh : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state), network_step w this s1 s2 -> Coh w s1 /\ Coh w s2
step_is_local : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_step w this s1 s2 -> forall z : nat_eqType, z != this -> find z (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) = find z (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P

```intros H_always H_rely.
intros s2 p P_always.
apply H_always.
apply H_always with (s2:=s2) (p:=p) (P:=P).
apply H_always.
apply H_always with (s2:=s2) (p:=p) (P:=P).
apply H_always.
apply H_rely.
Qed. 
```

original: intros H_always H_rely. intros s2 p P_always. apply H_always. apply H_always with (s2:=s2) (p:=p) (P:=P). apply H_always. apply H_always with (s2:=s2) (p:=p) (P:=P). apply H_always. apply H_rely.
